ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters vs Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Who is the pea and who is the carrot? Harmonic, who wears the pants in his house.  Well until midnight, when she bitches at me for playing for 6 hours and
ygData.messageBody:
> IMO, the best thing you could possible do is find a good enchanter to make
> friends with and group with him on a contiuous basis. Bard and enchanters
> go together like peas and carrots.

Who is the pea and who is the carrot?

Harmonic, who wears the pants in his house. Well until midnight,
when she bitches at me for playing for 6 hours and not fixing dinner
or cleaning up the place, and not holding her, etc.. etc.. etc...

women.... etc.. etc... etc... ;-)
